Yoga Schedule Sept 5th - Oct 28th

Inner Light Retreat Junerd - June 5th
Online registration available - Click here to learn more

Day Time Class
Sunday, February 26th 3:30pm Yoga Unveiled - free to the public, suggested $5 donation (vegetarian snacks are welcome).
Sunday, March 19th 4:00pm - 5:30pm Yin Yoga Class with Kalyani Nicole***
Sunday, April 9th 4:00pm - 6:30pm Yoga Nidra with Kalyani Nicole**
Monday 5:00pm - 6:00pm Gentle Hatha Yoga with Kalyani (Seated, Floor, minimal Standing postures)
Tuesday N/A No Classes at this time
Wednesday N/A No Classes at this time
Thursday 9:00am - 10:15am Mixed Levels Hatha Yoga with Kalyani (Standing, Seated, and Floor postures)

Friday, February 3rd N/A No Classes at this time
Saturday 9:00am - 10:00am Vinyasa Flow with Imke Jandreau

Class Fees

  • All levels welcome!
  • *ALL classes, except Restorative Yoga and Yoga Nidra classes are offered at $15 per class. The session rate is $13 per class, to be paid in full at the start of the session. You may then attend any class once a week during that session. Missed classes cannot be made up in another session.
  • **Restorative Yoga and Yoga Nidra classes are offered at $40 per class. Registration by contacting Kalyani Nicole is required to reserve your spot!
  • ***Yin Yoga classes are offered at $30 per class. Registration by contacting Kalyani Nicole is required to reserve your spot.

All Levels Welcome!

Classes at Idylwild Yoga are with Nicole Heath unless otherwise specified.
